text:
Chocolate, yummy, yummy. Chocolate, yummy,
yum. Chocolate, yummy, yummy. Chocolate, yummy,

yum. Chocolate. I’ve got a chocolate in
my tommy. Yay! Great. Oh Maggie, it’s nice

to sit here. Under the moon. Under Stars.
I am getting a little sleepy. Haha. Me too.

Time for bed.
Come on then, let’s go to bed.

Oh, hello. Hey! Are you not sleeping in bed?
It’s getting late. Oh, I am sleepy. Hey,

show me a sleepy face. And say, “I am sleepy,
sleepy, sleepy.” And again, “Sleepy, sleepy,

sleepy.” Oh dear. Are you sleepy? Yes? So
say, yes, I am. Are you sleepy? Yes, I am.

And again, are you sleepy? Yes I am. Oh dear.
Well. I am having a sleepover at Maggie’s

place. But, haha, she lives here up in this
tree.

Time to go to bed. This is crazy. Oh, hello
Maggie. Hi hi.

Your nest is a bit small. Come on Steve. Oh
dear. Well, here I am. Ok, well, I am sleepy.

So, aaa, time to go to sleep.
Uaah, yeah. Good night Maggie. Good night

Steve. Good night.
I can’t sleep, I am too cold. Cold, cold,

cold. Hey, why are you not sleeping. Because
I am too cold Maggie. Oh no, time for some

Maggie magic. Abracadabra. Oh, wow. Thanks
Maggie. That's better. Oh, great. I'm not

cold anymore. But I'm still sleepy. Me too.
Good night. Good night. Good night.

Oh, oh look. The sun is up. Yeah. Pfuu. I'm
quite hot in this sleeping bag. I have to

get out of this sleeping bag. Oh. Hey. Hey,
Steve. Be careful. Be careful. Oh no. Aaa.

Haha. Hello Steve. Don't worry Maggie. I'm
still here. Yeah.

It's Steve and Maggie.
Are you OK? Are you OK? Yes, yes, oh, hey…

Hello, hello, hello! How are you? Are you
happy? Sad? Or OK? I am OK! I am OK, OK, OK!

Say it with me… OK, OK, OK! Well done!
Hey, if you´re OK, you say yes, I am. So,

are you OK? Yes, I am. Are you OK? Yes, I
am! And again. Are you OK? Yes, I am.

Well done! Oh look, there is a playground.
Come on, let´s play! Haha, wow, look! A swing!

Hey. Wheee. I am more than OK now, I am happy.
Show me your happy face. Come on. Be happy,

happy, happy. Say it with me. Happy, happy,
happy. And again. Happy, happy, happy. Yeah.

Whooo.
Oh, hey, listen. What´s that noise? Oh, no!

Au! My bottom! Au! I am not happy now! No,
no, no! I am sad! Are you sad?

Hey, hello Steve! Hello Maggie. Why are you
so sad? Because my swing’s broken and I´ve

hurt my bottom. Au! Oh, no! Time for some
Maggie Magic! Abracadabra! Hey! Wow!

Thanks Maggie! Hey.
I am happy again. Happy, happy, happy!

It's Steve and Maggie.
Oh, hello. How are you? Where is Maggie? Oh,

look. She's up in the tree. Hello Maggie.
Are you hot or cold or sleepy?

Hot. Hot. Are you hot? Are you hot? Hot. Hot.
No! No, I'm not.

Hot. Hot. Are you hot? Are you hot? Hot. Hot.
No! No, I'm not.

Cold. Cold. Are you cold? Are you cold? Cold.
Cold.

No! No, I'm not.
Cold. Cold. Are you cold? Are you cold? Cold.

Cold.
No! No, I'm not.

Sleepy. Sleepy. Are you sleepy? Are you sleepy?
Sleepy. Sleepy.

Yes. Yes, I am.
Sleepy. Sleepy. Are you sleepy? Are you sleepy?

Sleepy. Sleepy.
Yes. Yes, I am.

Oh, shhh. Sorry Maggie.
It's Steve and Maggie.

Hello Steve.
Hello Maggie.

Hello boys and girls, hi.
Hello!

I am not happy today.
Oh dear.

No.
What happened Steve?

Well, I went on holiday in the mountains.
First, I wanted to go for a walk but it wasn´t

fun.
Walk, walk, walk, walk. Hey! Hello! Look,

it´s cold but it´s sunny. A good day for
a walk.

Stand up and walk with me. Stand up and walk,
yeah! Walk, walk, walk, walk, walk, walk,

walk, walk, walk. Come on! Walk, walk, walk,
walk, walk, walk, walk, walk, walk. Wow! Look

at all this snow. Hey, listen. What´s that?
I don´t want to walk anymore.

Haha! That´s funny.
It´s ok. Maybe that was funny. Under the

snow.
Yeah!

Haha! But then it got worse.
Oh, what happened?

Oh well, I wanted to skate. But that was a
bad idea.

Hey, look! Skating! Skate, skate, skate, skate,
skate. Yeah! Can you skate with me? Stand

up. Come on and skate, skate, skate, skate,
skate, skate. Yeah! Great! Oh no! Auuuu! Oh,

I don´t want to skate anymore!
Hey! Stop laughing! Hey, stop it! It hurt

my bottom.
Oh dear!

But then, hey, I wanted to ski and that was
a very, very, very bad idea.

Ski! Yeah! Ski, ski, ski. Can you ski with
me? Come on. Stand up. Stand up and ski, ski,

ski, ski, ski, yeah! Well done! Oh no, ski
jump!

I don´t want to ski anymore!
Oh dear!

You see? Look.
Yeah!

Oh and now it´s very bad because I need the
toilet. And I can´t walk.

But you can hop.
Hop?

Yeah!
OK, hey, here we go.

Hop, hop, hop, hop. Hop with me.
Hop, hop, hop, hop.

Hop, hop.
Steve, stop. Steve!

Hop, hop, hop.
Sorry Maggie?

Here´s a Maggie magic.
Abracadabra!

Oh, thanks Maggie.
Yeah!

Oh come on, let´s ski!
It's Steve and Maggie.

Hello boys and girls. How are you?
I'm happy. How are you? How are you? I'm happy.

How are you? How are you?
I'm happy happy happy happy happy happy. I'm

happy.
Happy, sad, hot or cold. How are you today?

Happy, sad, hot or cold. How are you today?
I'm sad. How are you? How are you? I'm sad.

How are you? How are you?
I'm sad sad sad sad sad sad. I'm sad.

Happy, sad, hot or cold. How are you today?
Happy, sad, hot or cold. How are you today?

I'm hot. How are you? How are you? I'm hot.
How are you? How are you?

I'm hot hot hot hot hot hot hot hot. I'm hot.
Happy, sad, hot or cold. How are you today?

Happy, sad, hot or cold. How are you today?
I'm cold. How are you? How are you? I'm cold.

How are you? How are you?
I'm cold cold cold cold cold cold. I'm cold.

Happy, sad, hot or cold. How are you today?
Happy, sad, hot or cold. How are you today?
Bye, bye. I
